meanings.definition: To leave behind or give up completely
meanings.sent1: She abandons her old toys when she gets new ones.
meanings.sent2: He abandons his unfinished puzzle and starts a new one.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful squirrel abandons his acorn in different places every day.
meanings.sent4: The artist abandons realism and embraces abstract art.
meanings.sent5: The explorer abandons the safety of the known path to venture into the uncharted forest.

meanings.sent1: The lost puppy abandons its search for home and follows the kind stranger.
meanings.sent2: The sailor abandons the sinking ship and swims to safety.
meanings.sent3: The magician's rabbit abandons the hat and hops into the audience.
meanings.sent4: The student abandons the difficult math problem and moves on to the next one.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker abandons the steep trail and takes a rest by the stream.

meanings.definition: To relinquish control or responsibility for
meanings.sent1: The manager abandons the project to focus on other priorities.
meanings.sent2: The parent abandons the strict rules for a day of fun with the kids.
meanings.sent3: The chef abandons the recipe and creates a new dish on the spot.
meanings.sent4: The leader abandons the decision-making to the team for this task.
meanings.sent5: The teacher abandons the traditional teaching methods for a more interactive approach.
